snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire, the pick-and-rolling, power-dunking star, is now a student of the low post, and his teacher is the Hall of Famer Hakeem Olajuwon.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column notes that New York Knicks forward Amar'e Stoudemire has been working with Hall of Famer Hakeem Olajuwon this off-season to try and develop his low post skills.
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire, the pick-and-rolling, power-dunking star, is now a student of the low post, and his teacher is the Hall of Famer Hakeem Olajuwon.

headline.seo: Knicks’ Stoudemire Working to Put New Spin on His Career
headline.main: Stoudemire Putting New Spin on Career
headline.print_headline: Stoudemire Putting New Spin on Career
